amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide guidelines for implementing the secured alternatives to detention provision in section 402(a).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 109-347 to provide guidelines for implementing the secured alternatives to detention provision in section 402(a).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 252 (Roll no. 639).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
